Vlad transformed to his massive Timber Wolf mode, thus providing 
himself more protection against the seering blast. His leg then 
entered in action. It came up in a powerful kick. Adding to it with 
concentrated laser fire, he hoped to push her outside of the circle of 
equals, thus ending the trial of possession.
